title: Tony Isidore, Galvanizing Adman, Is Dead at 89
description: With arresting ad campaigns, he helped promote the New York Urban Coalition (“Give a Damn”) and the re-election of Mayor John V. Lindsay (“I Made Mistakes”).
dc:creator: Sam Roberts
media:description: Tony Isidore, left, collaborated with the New York Urban Coalition for its “Give a Damn” campaign. With him, from left, were his collaborators Michael Ulick, Marvin Lefkowitz and Bob Elgort.
